title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 20.2 - Notice of termination of agent's appointment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 20.2 - Notice of termination of agent's appointment

State Regulations

Forms of notice of termination of appointment of insurance agents and title insurance agents pursuant to Insurance Law section 2112 are prescribed as follows: for agents licensed pursuant to Insurance Law section 2103(a); for agents licensed pursuant to Insurance Law section 2103(b). These forms may be obtained upon request to the Department of Financial Services, Albany, NY. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง
20.2

Amended

New

York State Register October 18, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 42, eff. 10/18/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
